title: Automatic ESG Assessment of Companies by Mining and Evaluating Media Coverage Data: NLP Approach and Tool

tldr: 通过NLP方法和工具，本研究旨在从文本媒体反应中自动提取ESG相关信息，实现公司ESG的自动评估。
en_tdlr: This study aims to automatically extract ESG-related information from textual media reactions using NLP methods and tools for automatic ESG assessment of companies.
